title: Good place to stay
text: I had a very pleasant stay at 414 Hotel Inn despite the summer sun in New York city . The room was comfortable and and the general atmosphere was friendly and the rates was right , Sakine had a broad knowledge of New York and the world this is obvious this lady has travailed extensively and has a vast knowledge of New York . Her suggestion for which places to visit , shopping , restaurants was extremely helpfully . I will definitely return to this hotel from now on and highly recommend it to family and friends visiting New York City . Well done 414 Hotel and staff . You made my visit to New York city a happy one . Best . Nana
